alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Duval; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Flagler, southeastern Bradford, northeastern Alachua, St. Johns, northern Putnam, Clay and southern Duval Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 500 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fruit Cove to near George`s Lake to near Gainesville. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph, penny size hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Saint Augustine, Palatka, Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Starke, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Hastings and East Palatka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
